main event: An anonymous complainant reported observing a UFO hovering approximately 20 feet above the ground in North San Juan, California on June 11, 1967.
interesting points: The UFO emitted a bright, pulsing light while hovering,The object rapidly accelerated and disappeared from view,No physical evidence was found at the scene of the sighting,Witness described the object as oval-shaped, bright metallic, about 25-30 feet in diameter,The witness reported seeing a bright metallic object moving erratically for about 5 minutes.
